languages.text:
Прежде чем совершить действие в бою, оцените его эффективность с помощью голограммы.
Первое нажатие {console_bind|Confirm} на поле боя разместит на нем голограмму. Выбирайте действия и {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способности{/g}, чтобы посмотреть на ожидаемый эффект от их использования — он будет исходить от голограммы и позволит оценить, удачно ли вы выбрали место для запланированного действия. Чтобы применить выбранное действие, подтвердите его повторным нажатием {console_bind|Confirm} по цели или отмените выбор кнопкой {console_bind|Decline}.

traits.locale_text:
Первое нажатие { console_bind | Confirm} на поле боя разместит на нём голограмму.
Вы можете выбрать способность или выстрел и посмотреть эффективность их применения, которая будет считать от голограммы.
Чтобы применить выбранное действие, вам достаточно подтвердить его вторым нажатием { console_bind | Confirm} по цели или отменить выбор кнопкой { console_bind | Decline}.

languages.text:
Before taking an action in combat, you can evaluate its effectiveness with a hologram.
Pressing {console_bind|Confirm} on the battlefield once will place a hologram in that location. Select actions and {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} to see the expected outcome of their use. The action will be displayed as if used from the hologram's location to let you assess whether you have picked an effective position for the action you are planning to take. Press {console_bind|Confirm} on the target again to confirm your choice or press {console_bind|Decline} to cancel it.
languages.original_text:
Прежде чем совершить действие в бою, оцените его эффективность с помощью голограммы.
Первое нажатие {console_bind|Confirm} на поле боя разместит на нем голограмму. Выбирайте действия и {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способности{/g}, чтобы посмотреть на ожидаемый эффект от их использования — он будет исходить от голограммы и позволит оценить, удачно ли вы выбрали место для запланированного действия. Чтобы применить выбранное действие, подтвердите его повторным нажатием {console_bind|Confirm} по цели или отмените выбор кнопкой {console_bind|Decline}.

traits.locale_text:
Before taking an action in combat, you can evaluate its effectiveness with a hologram.
Pressing {console_bind|Confirm} on the battlefield once will place a hologram in that location. Select actions and abilities to see the expected outcome of their use. The action will be displayed as if used from the hologram's location to let you assess whether you have picked an effective position for the action you are planning to take. Press {console_bind|Confirm} on the target again to confirm your choice or press {console_bind|Decline} to cancel it.

The action will be displayed as if used from the hologram's location to let you assess whether you have picked an effective position for the action you are planning to take. Press {console_bind|Confirm} on the target again to confirm your choice or press {console_bind|Decline} to cancel it.

Before taking an action in combat, you can evaluate its effectiveness with a hologram.
Pressing {console_bind|Confirm} on the battlefield once will place a hologram in that location. Select actions and {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} to see the expected outcome of their use. The action will be displayed as if used from the hologram's location to let you assess whether you have picked an effective position for the action you are planning to take. Press {console_bind|Confirm} on the target again to confirm your choice or press {console_bind|Decline} to cancel it.

Before taking an action in combat, you can evaluate its {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effectiveness{/g} with a hologram.
Pressing {console_bind|Confirm} on the battlefield once will place a hologram in that location. Select actions and {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} to see the expected outcome of their use. The action will be displayed as if used from the hologram's location to let you assess whether you have picked an effective position for the action you are planning to take. Press {console_bind|Confirm} on the target again to confirm your choice or press {console_bind|Decline} to cancel it.

languages.text:
Antes de llevar a cabo una acción en combate, puedes evaluar su efectividad con un holograma.
Al pulsar {console_bind|Confirm} una vez en el escenario, se colocará un holograma en la ubicación exacta. Elige entre las distintas acciones y {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g} para ver el resultado estimado tras usarlas. Se mostrará la acción desde la ubicación del holograma para ayudarte a valorar si se trata de la posición más idónea para la acción que piensas ejecutar. Vuelve a pulsar {console_bind|Confirm} en el objetivo para confirmar tu decisión o pulsa {console_bind|Decline} para cancelarla.
languages.original_text:
Before taking an action in combat, you can evaluate its effectiveness with a hologram.
Pressing {console_bind|Confirm} on the battlefield once will place a hologram in that location. Select actions and {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} to see the expected outcome of their use. The action will be displayed as if used from the hologram's location to let you assess whether you have picked an effective position for the action you are planning to take. Press {console_bind|Confirm} on the target again to confirm your choice or press {console_bind|Decline} to cancel it.

traits.locale_text:
Antes de llevar a cabo una acción en combate, puedes evaluar su efectividad con un holograma.
Al pulsar {console_bind|Confirm} una vez en el escenario, se colocará un holograma en la ubicación exacta. Elige entre las distintas acciones y {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g} para ver el resultado estimado tras usarlas. Se mostrará la acción desde la ubicación del holograma para ayudarte a valorar si se trata de la posición más idónea para la acción que piensas ejecutar. Vuelve a pulsar {console_bind|Confirm} en el objetivo para confirmar tu decisión o pulsa {console_bind|Decline} para cancelarla.

languages.text:
戦闘、アクションを起こす前に、ホログラムでその効果を評価することができる。
戦場で{console_bind|Confirm}を1回押すと、その場所にホログラムが配置される。アクションと{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}を選択して、予想される結果を確認する。アクションは、ホログラムの位置から使用した様子が表示され、実行しようとしているアクションに対して効果的な位置を選択したかどうかを評価することができる。ターゲットで{console_bind|Confirm}をもう一度押して選択を確定するか、{console_bind|Decline}を押してキャンセルする。
languages.original_text:
Before taking an action in combat, you can evaluate its effectiveness with a hologram.
Pressing {console_bind|Confirm} on the battlefield once will place a hologram in that location. Select actions and {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} to see the expected outcome of their use. The action will be displayed as if used from the hologram's location to let you assess whether you have picked an effective position for the action you are planning to take. Press {console_bind|Confirm} on the target again to confirm your choice or press {console_bind|Decline} to cancel it.

traits.locale_text:
戦闘、アクションを起こす前に、ホログラムでその効果を評価することができる。
戦場で{console_bind|Confirm}を1回押すと、その場所にホログラムが配置される。アクションと{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}を選択して、予想される結果を確認する。アクションは、ホログラムの位置から使用した様子が表示され、実行しようとしているアクションに対して効果的な位置を選択したかどうかを評価することができる。ターゲットの{console_bind|Confirm}をもう一度押して選択を確定するか、{console_bind|Decline}を押してキャンセルする。

languages.text:
在战斗中，您可以通过全息影像来衡量自己的预期行动是否会发挥作用。
在战场上选择某个格子，然后按下{console_bind|Confirm}，您的角色的全息影像就会显示在目标格子处。您可以选择{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}或单发射击，查看预期结果。此次行动的具体情况会显示在角色的全息影像处，帮助您评估您执行的计划是否会发挥预期作用。再次按下{console_bind|Confirm}可确认您的选择，执行选定的操作。按下{console_bind|Decline}可取消。
languages.original_text:
Before taking an action in combat, you can evaluate its effectiveness with a hologram.
Pressing {console_bind|Confirm} on the battlefield once will place a hologram in that location. Select actions and {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} to see the expected outcome of their use. The action will be displayed as if used from the hologram's location to let you assess whether you have picked an effective position for the action you are planning to take. Press {console_bind|Confirm} on the target again to confirm your choice or press {console_bind|Decline} to cancel it.

traits.locale_text:
在战斗中正式采取行动之前，您可以通过全息影像来评估行动是否有效。
在战场上按下{console_bind|Confirm}，全息影像就会出现在目标位置。您可以选择行动与{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}，并查看使用后的预期结果。此次行动的具体情况会显示在角色的全息影像处，帮助您评估您执行的计划是否会发挥预期作用。在目标处再次按下{console_bind|Confirm}可确认行动，或按下{console_bind|Decline}取消行动。

languages.text:
Bevor du eine Aktion im Kampf ausführst, kannst du ihre Effektivität mit einem Hologramm überprüfen.
Wenn du {console_bind|Confirm} einmal auf dem Schlachtfeld drückst, wird ein Hologramm an dieser Stelle platziert. Wähle Aktionen und {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} aus, um das erwartete Ergebnis ihrer Anwendung zu sehen. Die Aktion wird so angezeigt, als würde sie von der Position des Hologramms aus ausgeführt, damit du einschätzen kannst, ob du eine effektive Position für die geplante Aktion gewählt hast. Drücke erneut {console_bind|Confirm} auf dem Ziel, um deine Wahl zu bestätigen oder drücke {console_bind|Decline}, um abzubrechen.
languages.original_text:
Before taking an action in combat, you can evaluate its effectiveness with a hologram.
Pressing {console_bind|Confirm} on the battlefield once will place a hologram in that location. Select actions and {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} to see the expected outcome of their use. The action will be displayed as if used from the hologram's location to let you assess whether you have picked an effective position for the action you are planning to take. Press {console_bind|Confirm} on the target again to confirm your choice or press {console_bind|Decline} to cancel it.

traits.locale_text:
Bevor du eine Aktion im Kampf ausführst, kannst du ihre Effektivität mit einem Hologramm überprüfen.
Wenn du {console_bind|Confirm} einmal auf dem Schlachtfeld drückst, wird ein Hologramm an dieser Stelle platziert. Wähle Aktionen und {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} aus, um das erwartete Ergebnis ihrer Anwendung zu sehen. Die Aktion wird so angezeigt, als würde sie von der Position des Hologramms aus ausgeführt, damit du einschätzen kannst, ob du eine effektive Position für die geplante Aktion gewählt hast. Drücke erneut {console_bind|Confirm} auf dem Ziel, um deine Wahl zu bestätigen oder drücke {console_bind|Decline}, um sie abzubrechen.

languages.text:
Au combat, avant d'exécuter une action, vous pouvez évaluer son efficacité à l'aide d'un hologramme.
Appuyez une fois sur {console_bind|Confirm} sur le champ de bataille pour y placer un hologramme. Sélectionnez des actions et des {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} pour voir le résultat attendu. L'action envisagée sera affichée comme si elle était utilisée depuis l'emplacement de l'hologramme pour vous permettre de savoir si vous avez opté pour une position efficace. Appuyez à nouveau sur {console_bind|Confirm} sur la cible pour confirmer votre choix ou appuyez sur {console_bind|Decline} pour l'annuler.
languages.original_text:
Before taking an action in combat, you can evaluate its effectiveness with a hologram.
Pressing {console_bind|Confirm} on the battlefield once will place a hologram in that location. Select actions and {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} to see the expected outcome of their use. The action will be displayed as if used from the hologram's location to let you assess whether you have picked an effective position for the action you are planning to take. Press {console_bind|Confirm} on the target again to confirm your choice or press {console_bind|Decline} to cancel it.

traits.locale_text:
Au combat, avant d’effectuer une action, vous pouvez évaluer son efficacité à l'aide d'un hologramme.
Appuyez une fois sur {console_bind|Confirm} sur le champ de bataille pour y placer un hologramme. Sélectionnez des actions et des {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} pour voir le résultat attendu. L'action envisagée sera affichée comme si elle était utilisée depuis l'emplacement de l'hologramme pour vous permettre de savoir si vous avez opté pour une position efficace. Appuyez à nouveau sur {console_bind|Confirm} sur la cible pour confirmer votre choix ou appuyez sur {console_bind|Decline} pour l'annuler.

languages.text:
Çatışmada bir eylem gerçekleştirmeden önce, hologramla etkililiğini değerlendirebilirsin.
Çatışma alanındaki bir yere hologram yerleştirmek için oraya {console_bind|Confirm} düğmesiyle bir kez bas. Beklenen sonucunu görmek için bir eylem veya {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyet{/g} seç. Eylem, onun için etkili bir konum seçip seçmediğini değerlendirebilmen amacıyla hologramın bulunduğu yerden yapıyormuşsun gibi görüntülenecektir. Seçimini onaylamak için hedefin üstündeyken tekrar {console_bind|Confirm} düğmesine, iptal etmek içinse {console_bind|Decline} düğmesine bas.

The action will be displayed as if used from the hologram's location to let you assess whether you have picked an effective position for the action you are planning to take. Press {console_bind|Confirm} on the target again to confirm your choice or press {console_bind|Decline} to cancel it.
